name: mud-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user attacks by hurling mud. It also reduces the foe’s SPEED.
